#summary The Algorithm for the project - each time you add something add it here too.
#labels Featured,Algorithm


*Initally*
  *  Set Image to ship
  *  Draw Image to screen buffer

*When Image is clicked:*
  *  _While mouse is being draged_
   *  Set position of ship to mouse position
   *  Draw ship to screen buffer

*When mouse is released*
  *  Stop setting the position of the ship to mouse position
